name: Deus Ex Machina Clone (FINNJC)
description:
Arrow Keys for Green Square Inputs
R for Restart

Audio included in game. On Itch the main audio can have up to a approx. 5 second delay, I assume to do with having to loading the large file. I apologise for this aberation.

I have included downloadable Windows and Mac Builds which should lack the audio issue. Press ESC on these builds to shut them down.
